actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: A bill to provide for the compensation of the Clallam County Historical Society for its participation in the construction of the Pioneer Memorial Museum at Olympic National Park, Washington.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to pay a specified sum to a named organization in compensation for the relinquishment of its interest in certain property in Washington State and in satisfaction of any claim arising out of construction on such property.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the compensation of the Clallam County Historical Society for its participation in the construction of the Pioneer Memorial Museum at Olympic National Park, Washington.
